text: I am trying to update a color in the *branding kit*, but it seems to be broken? Anyone knows if this is a common issue?
Hey Mathias, I am not able to recreate this issue. Are you still running into this? If so, can you please provide me with your portal id.
Hey can somebody please share to me the files to upload for the HubSpot cms practicum?

Not sure if you're actively trying to cheat here, but one of the main requirements for this thing is submitting original work. And the folks who grade this are active in this slack group. For instance... me :corgi-wave:
